title: Transmission oversight gives project managers ‘eyes in the field’
description: Extra eyes in the field will be necessary along with other resources if the current speed of transmission construction is to keep pace with experts’ projections, writes contributor Bill Perry.
content: Extra eyes in the field will be necessary along with other resources if the current speed of transmission construction is to keep pace with experts’ projections, writes contributor Bill Perry.
